ygData.subject: Re: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: I really believe Verant is making things harder for the players cause a lot of ppl hit Lvl 50 to fast and were killing things they shouldn t be killing this
ygData.messageBody:
I really believe Verant is making things harder for the players cause a lot
of ppl hit Lvl 50 to fast and were killing things they shouldn't be killing
this soon in the game (Lady Vox). I remember reading once on EQVault that
Brad didn't seem to happy with the power gamers. Can't remember all he said
but I know he didn't see why anyone would want to play EQ like that, said
how if he did he'd get bored of it fast, also talked about ppl hitting Lvl
50 in just a few months when it should've taken them at least a year. Cause
if you notice what are they changing all the time? High lvl spells, high
lvl zones and it's not for the better but to make it harder on the players
so they can't get lvls as fast as they once did.
Just like that rumor that they might be making it to where if you heal
someone it might not even work. If they do that then whats the point in
being a Cleric if we can't heal a party member thats in trouble?
If Verant thinks the game is so unbalanced now, then why did they release it
this way? Why not have waited a few extra months and fix the classes? I
think they did believe it was well balanced but when players start whinning
that their class isn't as good as the next then instade of making them a bit
better, that other class gets punished for it and get their spells weakened,
or where they may or may not work on another player.
Well thats enough outta me for now.

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>
>
> I couldn't agree more, Azor. Verant seems totally preoccupied with
> discovering and fixing ways players have found to make the game more
> playable, rather than looking for positive changes that should be made to
> improve both the classes and the game, itself. It seems all they focus on
> is how to make things harder on the players.
>
> Why DON'T they fix Fear Plane, or do something to improve the gosh awful
> camping that is going on every single place where a decent item is found.
> Last weekend, we (our level 50s) went to like 7 different places to try
and
> obtain items for some of us that didn't have them. This was at 10am EDT
on
> a Sunday morning. Every single last place was camped and the lower level
> groups that were there told us they would be there all day and nite.
Since
> there was really nothing else for us to do, (can't go to Fear and noone
> needs exp anymore) we all simply logged and went about doing RL things
> outside of EQ.
>
> Verant needs to wake up to the fact that their high level players are
> getting fed up and bored, and THAT's why they are leaving and/or selling
> their characters on ebay and looking for new games.
>
> Mik
